DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Gathering information patient solid tumor implantable venous access device may help doctor learn patient satisfaction . PURPOSE : This phase I trial study satisfaction placement implantable venous access device patient solid tumor .

DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine patient satisfaction subcutaneous venous-access device placement oncology patient . OUTLINE : Patients complete computer-based survey treatment area Vanderbilt Oncology Clinic . Basic demographic information basic information regard placement device complication collect patient 's medical record .
